issue.title: Full translation support for Farsi/Persian
issue.body:
Full translation into Farsi/Persian language along with correction of spelling and grammatical errors.
Based on app latest changes.

comments.body: ****CLA Assistant Lite bot**** All contributors have signed the CLA  ✍️ ✅

performed_via_github_app.name: GitHub Actions
performed_via_github_app.description: Automate your workflow from idea to production

Hi.
The error that occurred was probably due to the fact that I had used version 2.2 of the Poedit.
In the fixed commit, I used the latest version of the Poedit (3.4).I think the CI fails have been solved.
